availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Edmund B. Loyd (Bedford County, Tennessee, and Trigg County, Kentucky, laborer and farmer)

body.p: Trigg County, Kentucky, laborer and farmer. Tennessee native. Son of Lee Loyd and Nancy Loyd. Father of Frances Loyd and Lucy Loyd. Laborer in Bedford County, Tennessee, in 1850. Farmer in Trigg County, Kentucky, in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Bedford County, District 5, p. 129B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Harmony, p. 457B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Trigg County, KY, June 1863, p. 29.
